column4: at the link u gave me there is only installation instructions for ubuntu 6.06 and 7.04 and i use ubuntu 7.10
they might be the same, why are you trying to install lamp anyway?  There might be more specific instructions if you have a certain purpose
i am a web developer and i want to run my sites locally while creating them. i was using windows so far and there i used wamp (windows apache mysql php)
sudo tasksel install lamp-server works fine thanks for the link :D
